thread.title: High School Baseball Player Serves Up Mighty Bat Flip
thread.title_full: High School Baseball Player Serves Up Mighty Bat Flip

author: Patrick Redford
title: High School Baseball Player Serves Up Mighty Bat Flip
text:
Go to permalink GIF 
The bat flip is not the transgressive act of defiance that it once was ( the MLB now celebrates them ), but a nice nonchalant bat toss is still the best way to show out after a big dinger. To truly differentiate yourself amongst a nation of bat flippers, you have to stand out, as high school player Dakota Limon does. Put simply, the guy can flip the hell out of a bat. 
That wasnâ€™t even his first time opting for the bombastic bat toss. 
Keep on flipping your bat, my dude. Recommended Stories
